item.title: Payjoin
item.description: Should Payjoin be introduced into Bitcoin Core wallet? Not a strong yes, but no direct objections. Effect on Existing Wallet Users Would require user interaction, so if the user doesn’t initiate Payjoin, the corresponding code path wouldn’t be invoked. HTTP Does Payjoin require HTTPS to be re-introduced? No, Payjoin uses Oblivious HTTP. Uses HTTP with an encrypted payload. Could use existing crypto modules in Bitcoin. HTTP in Bitcoin Core is a larger topic, so the implementation of HTTP for Payjoin should align with the larger usage of HTTP.
